name: Symmetry!
description:
Greetings, honored soul.

This passage of writing is an invitation to your path of tranquility. Symmetry will grant peace. Symmetry will lead to balance. Symmetry will open the inner path towards to the center of your own universe.

This game hones your patience, reflexes, timing, and unique abilities by using puzzles that can be solved by physics. Symmetry is the balance of many things. Let this be the cosmic balance, or let this be the balance of some balls, blocks and swinging flails, all held together by the harmony of physics.

With 108 unique puzzles to show your skills and knowledge on physics, Symmetry reflects upon the teachings of many Shaolin monks.* Fans to blow the objects with strong winds, chained balls that swing and hit other objects, balls with holes that bounce around, beams and platforms to use as catapults and ramps, springs to launch objects with great speed and balloons to lift other objects. Physics has never been this variant in a game!

Are you stuck and don't know what to do? Do not be frightened, for the path is illuminated by those who past those puzzles. Watch solutions to absolve yourself of confusion and doubt, and you shall find the symmetry within your spirit.

Your love will cherish as you complete puzzles with your knowledge of physics. You will feed your anger as you fail them. Everything is in balance. Everything achieves symmetry. Play today and achieve your own symmetry.

Game Features
+ Completely free to play.
+ A grand spectrum of difficulty on physics, spread evenly among hand-made 108 colorful levels.
+ A realistic experience of physics achieved by solving puzzles.
+ Watch solutions, then try it on your own.
+ Take the advantage of physics by using chained balls, bouncy balls, balloons, air fans, beams, springs, and objects.

(*) Warlock Arts are not responsible for the kidnapped Shaolin monks in order to understand the philosophy behind symmetry. We really are confused just as you are.

Should you lose your way in the path of the symmetry, or find your own way, let us know by writing to support@warlockarts.com
